name: Adaptive Anything Architecture
description: Universal protocol specification for governed AI agent tools.

layers.name: Tool Interface Contracts
layers.requirement: Strict JSON Schema validation for all inputs/outputs.

layers.name: Agent Capability & Attestation
layers.requirement: SHA256 signed manifests declaring tools and constraints (Gap 4).

layers.name: Host Governance & Constraint
layers.requirement: Real-time physics monitoring (TEARFRAME) and policy injection.

layers.name: Execution & Audit
layers.requirement: Deterministic loop with immutable Merkle-tree logging.

verdicts.SABAR: Ambiguity or rate limit detected, pause for 72h cooling.
verdicts.VOID: Hard floor breach (F1/F5/F9) or Amanah fail.
verdicts.HOLD_888: Human intervention required for high-stakes consensus (Gap 6).
